description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 03/30/2006

Felicia opens her eyes for Stephanie and Eric. Felicia wakes up and starts to have an argument with Stephanie when Stephanie realizes it’s a fight they had when Felicia was fifteen.  It’s obvious that Felicia’s condition is affecting her brain as well.  Christian tells Stephanie and Eric, Felicia needs that liver transplant right away. Ridge declares his commitment to Brooke.
